text:
Emerging Mathematical Ideas

Begin to develop an algorithm for subtracting any two rational numbers, connecting to number lines, chip boards and/or patterns.

Subtraction is:

  • find the difference between the numbers or how far apart the numbers are on a number line
  • a larger number minus a smaller number equals a positive difference
  • a smaller number minus a larger number equals a negative difference

NWDYK

Describe an algorithm for subtracting rational numbers? How does this compare to your algorithm for subtracting whole numbers?
